variable.name: consent
variable.description: CONSENT GROUP AS DETERMINED BY DAC
variable.comment: All genotyping data and tissue were collected as part of the Pathobiologic Determinants of Atherosclerosis (PDAY) Study. These materials were collected from deceased individuals and completely de-identified; therefore there was no informed consent required or obtained and there are no restrictions on the use of the data other than those outlined in the DUC or established by other relevant NIH policies.

variable.name: source_subjid
variable.description: SUBJECT ID USED IN THE SOURCE REPOSITORY
